About Me

My programming journey...

I am a knowledgeable front-end developer with over 3 years of hands-on experience in UI/UX and JavaScript/ES6 and over 1.5 years of experience mentoring and educating developers in React.js/Node.js first principles. Passionate about responsive design, site accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility along with staying up to date with current technology trends and best practices. Currently looking for front-end roles that allow me to apply my knowledge in React.js, UI/UX, and web accessibility.

I am currently traveling with my wife, 2 kids, and my 9-year-old rescue dog in a 28-foot trailer. We are currently exploring Central and Northern California. When I'm not coding, you can find me spending my time with my family, hiking, scoping out the best local food and beer, listening to podcasts (tech and comedy), and watching the Los Angeles Dodgers (hopefully) dominate the NL West.

Trilogy Education (UCR Extension)

Software Engineering Technical Teaching Assistant

Conducting educational sessions for developers as a subject matter expert (SME) in ES6 JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js. Achieved a 30% increase in overall student satisfaction over a 12 week period by interacting with students daily, answering web-related questions, and removing impediments that delayed their progress to completing projects.

Turnkey Marketing

Full-Stack PHP Developer

Oversaw the full lifecycle of software development for the critical internal PHP application.As a result, 9 major product updates were completed on time and on budget. I decreased the social media department report gathering hours by over 20% by developing an internal reporting tool written in Vue.js and Bulma.

Deluxe Brand Marketing

Front-End JavaScript Developer

Improved the overall customer satisfaction of the mission-critical external web app by 50% through revamping UI, UX, and overall design aesthetic. I transformed Photoshop files into standards-compliant HTML email templates in a Node/AWS environment that has been utilized weekly by over 150 real estate agents.
